channel.title: Procrastination on Lisa's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Procrastination on Lisa's Notebook

item.title: Painting and Procrastination
item.description: Houseboats need paint. They need quite a lot of paint, quite often. I got some advice when I first bought the boat: figure out how much you can get done in an hour, or half an hour, including setting up your equipment and cleaning it and putting it away. Do this because you will often have an hour to paint, but you will far less often have a day to do it.
